text: yadi nikat (bhavishy mein) hee kuchh milanevaala hota aur safar bhee halaka hota to ve avashy tumhaare peechhe chal padate, kintu maarg kee dooree unhen kathin aur bahut deergh prateet huee. ab ve allaah kee qasamen khaenge ki, "yadi hamamen isakee saamarthy hotee to ham avashy tumhaare saath nikalate." ve apane aapako tabaahee mein daal rahe hai aur allaah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai ki nishchay hee ve jhoothe hai
